title: Heartseeker Nami

embed.description: Heartseeker Nami by 魔法少女圈

body: Thats absolutely beautiful, and if Riot makes a Heartseeker Nami I would love her to look like that.

replies.body: Cute <3 I'd rather have that than Koi Nami.
Koi Nami is the best skin >:(
Pfft, Koi Nami got nothing on Urf the Nami-tee or Deep Sea Nami X)
nami-tee is my favourite
I like the purple and yellow chromas, but not the base color.
Koi Nami is the only skin I have chromas for... and I have all of them haha
I'm traditionally a Nami-main but I can't find myself liking any of her current skins enough to buy them- this? This I would buy- the second it came out and I logged on.

> [{quoted}](name=SociopathFriend,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aNPLqMEZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-11-07T18:06:35.498+0000)
>
> I'm traditionally a Nami-main but I can't find myself liking any of her current skins enough to buy them- this? This I would buy- the second it came out and I logged on.

The problem is Nami is one of those rare champions where her classic is just legitimately amazing and out classes most of her other skins Hell even her best skin "deep terror" is just her classic skin with darker cell shading.

Other champions on that list of amazing classics would be
{{champion:268}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:29}} 

Of course this is all opinionative but most the champions i listed i feel the classic skins are so good that why would u even bother with skins?
{{champion:37}} ,{{champion:136}} ,{{champion:143}} ,{{champion:163}} , and {{champion:103}} also have very nice classics
Yes. I own all of Sona's skins and I adore Sweetheart and Pentakill, but I find myself using base Sona from time to time. It's such a lovely base skin.

how on earth did i forget sol?
It's ok. Everyone overlooks a cosmic space dragon at some point in their life.

Jax
Amazing classic

Huh???

> [{quoted}](name=Placentas,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aNPLqMEZ,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2017-11-07T19:57:00.072+0000)
>

> Huh???

would u really waste money on anything other than skt jax? his skins be poopie

I mean his base is iconic.

I got The Mighty Jax where he's a hockey player as a shard and I actually really like it. I never play Jax though. I like his fishing skin too. Beside those two Im not really even sure what skins he has lol. I think Gladiator?

But its also not like they can add a ton of new particle effects for him.
Could have a Weaponmaster skin where his weapon changes every time he swings it.
I don't know about every time he swings but I think they could make it were everytime he lvls up or every 6 lvls he changes weapons.

Personally I think it'd be funny, since by late game his weapon would basically be strobing.

But then again I get amused really easily, so....
I have to disagree, her River Spirit skin's recal music is amazing.
Den air bladders.
I think it'd better fit the Sweetheart side of the line.  That looks awesome though...need it to happen!
MAH NAMIIIIIII!!!!!!!! I adore the Heartseeker skin line. This would be perfect for her. I’m in love. <3
*casually waits for a wild Riot KateyKhaos to appear*
im still waiting for Lava Nami skin where everying about her is lava and brimstone

I wouldn't expect anyone, myself included to every say this but,

"Fish tits never looked so good."
I feel like her face is a little stern for heartseeker, but other than that it's all great.
Yes please! I was very disappointed with her last skin... I know Riot can do better.
Aren't there mermaid legends about some scary looking ones? It'd be cool for spooky skin

This is so amazing!
Give me! I love Nami and want more skins for her!
Personally, i'd rather see a new theme instead of re-using all the older ones.
I support Nami with hair :D
I would totally love that. :)
Absolutely beautiful!
That would be great, but I'd want to see a heartbreaker Cass along with it.  ;)
